author: Fighterkit3
title: MoleSkin: Not your average Notebook
review:
The Moleskin is not your average notebook.

Pros

  • Pro 1 It includes some stickers and a minifig creator stickers.
  • Pro 2 It has a little pamphlet that tells the history of the Moleskin.
  • Pro 3 The brick plate allows for people to put creations or minifigs on it.

Cons

  • Con 1 It doesn't really have any cons.

The moleskin Note book is a good place for stickers and it is a good place to start writing stories or list the prices of sets you want and other useful things.
